name: Space Station Elevated Bus
description: Do the honor of firstly driving Elevated Bus in the space. Join the job of responsible driver and perform your pick and drop duty well. Space Station Elevated bus is a heavy traffic transit train for public transportation. Play super elevated bus above the road traffic in new space station and say gud bye to the mess of traffic jam. This is a real crazy driving in the midst of traffic rush in high speed mode, leave behind the threats of road accidents our heavy transit. pick up the pessengers from high flying bus station and drive nonstop transport bus in between space stations.
